item.description:
For those of you who don't have plans for Christmas Eve come join me for some festive ice skating follwed by a scrumptious dinner!

We will meet at 5:00pm at the Patriots Place Winter Skate (details on exactly where to follow) and do some skating. Then at 7:00pm we will head to Davios for a elegant delicious dinner!

Click here to check out Davios menu.

Skating entrance is $6.00, Rentals are $4.00.

And if you need to fit in any last minute shopping there are plently of places available!

If you will only be joining the dinner part of this meetup please indicate in your RSVP.
item.name: Christmas Eve Ice Skating & Dinner
